items.sentence: Is there any hope this will end any time soon?
I hope you already know what needs to be done.
I hope that I never have another heart attack.
I've heard women spend more on shoes than men.
This isn't a bad way to spend a Monday, right?
We hope that happens sooner rather than later.
I hope Tom hasn't been bothering you too much.
The newspaper says that she committed suicide.
If you're cold, it's OK to turn on the heater.
I just wanted to let you know I can't do that.
I just know I don't want to be married to you.
I think you know that that's impossible to do.
I suppose you already know that that's my car.
I know that you still can't do that very well.
I know that that wasn't the right thing to do.
I'm not the one who warned Tom not to do that.
I'm not the one who told Tom not to trust you.
Dinner is usually not ready until six o'clock.
This is one of the best places to eat in town.
If you eat well, you're likely to live longer.
I think this is the best meal I've ever eaten.
My grandfather used to make his own furniture.
Could you please explain what's going on here?
I don't know how to respond to that right now.
I bought lace curtains for my bedroom windows.
Tom isn't the same as he was thirty years ago.
Tom isn't as smart as he likes to think he is.
I'm not the one who taught Tom how to do that.
I'm not the one who showed Tom how to do that.
I didn't know Tom used to be a French teacher.
I didn't know that Tom didn't like to do that.
The monkey was swallowed by a boa constrictor.
The exit is in the same place as the entrance.
Everybody who disagreed with Tom had to leave.
Tom is fatter now than he was three years ago.
Tom got ticketed for passing on a yellow line.
Tom is in Boston this week on a business trip.
You really think this is necessary, don't you?
Tom isn't sure that he needs to do that again.
Tom isn't sure Mary knew he wanted to do that.
This gun smells like it's been fired recently.
I'd like Thousand Island dressing on my salad.
Tom will be late because of the heavy traffic.
One of my favorite TV shows has been canceled.
Tom was the one who suggested we buy balloons.
Let's try to find out what we need to do next.
I had lots of friends when I was in Australia.
We have room for three more people in our van.
If I don't do that, someone else will have to.
You and I make about the same amount of money.
